xmlns="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:imports> <b:namespace location=".\propertyschema.xsd" prefix="ns0" uri="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema"/> </b:imports> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="OrderIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:properties> <b:property name="ns0:clientOrderNumber" xpath="/*[local-name()='OrderIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify']/*[local-name()='clientOrderNumber' and namespace-uri()='']"/> </b:properties> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates a unique order number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns0="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema" xmlns:b="http://schemas.microsoft.com/BizTalk/2003" xmlns="http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:imports> <b:namespace location=".\propertyschema.xsd" prefix="ns0" uri="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema"/> </b:imports> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="customer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information about the the end user being provisioned"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerAccountNumber"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerSocialSecurityNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This is the End User's Social Security Number. This represents the unique ID for each residential end user (particularly for CARE transactions). If the end user is a business entity, it will have no Social Security Number and the unique ID will be the Federal Tax ID. If both the SSN and Federal Tax ID are populated, SSN should take precedence as the unique ID."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerFederalTaxID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This is the end user's Federal Tax ID. This is used as the unique ID for business entities. If both SSN and Federal Tax ID fields are populated, SSN should take precedence in becoming the unique ID."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="customerFullName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the full name of the end user customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="customerType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies if the customer is a business or residential customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="RES"/> <xs:pattern value="BUS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="oldCustomerType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies if the customer used to be a business or residential customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="RES"/> <xs:pattern value="BUS"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="multiLineIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates if this is a multiline or single line account"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> <xs:minLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="MULTI"/> <xs:pattern value="SINGLE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="agencyAuthorization"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies that the end user customer has given authorization for this local service request."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="agencyAuthorizationDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the date of the agency authorization. The date format is MMDDYY in Central Time."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="billingName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the name of the responsible billing party to whom the Access Provider renders the bill for services provided."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="billingAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="regionalAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="masterAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerPIN"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="groupID"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="authorizationName"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="45"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="directoryListing"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields associated with the directory listings "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="1"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingActivity"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the activity for the directory listing."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHANGE NEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHANGE OLD"/> <xs:enumeration value="NO CHANGE"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingRecordType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the type of listing according to tariffs. For example, this indicates a main listing or an additional listing. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL MAIN LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL ADDITIONAL MAIN LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL ADDITIONAL LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingPublicationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the type of listings being submitted with respect to publication and directory assistance (DA) rules. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="PUBLISHED"/> <xs:pattern value="NON-PUBLISHED"/> <xs:pattern value="NON-LISTED"/> <xs:pattern value="PRIVATE"/> <xs:pattern value="NO DIRECTORY"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingStyleCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies whether the listing is a straight line, caption header, etc."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="STRAIGHT LINE"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingDegreeIndentation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies how many degrees the listing is indented."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="0"/> <xs:enumeration value="X"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dualNameListing"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies if a listing is to be a dual name listing. For example, John & Mary"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Y"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listingLastName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the first word for business listing or the complete last name for residence listings."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listingFirstName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates all except the first word for business listings or all of the first name or names and middle name or initials for residence listings. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="titleOfLineageSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to designate lineage of a listed person, e.g. Jr, Sr, III, etc. In the case of a dual name listing, this indicates the lineage for the first name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dualNameTitleOfLineageSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to designate lineage of a listed person, e.g. Jr, Sr, III, etc. In the case of a dual name listing, this indicates the lineage for the second name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="titleOfAddressPrefix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to address a listed person, e.g. Mr, Dr, etc. For a dual name listing, this field represents the address of the first name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> value="25"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nickname"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="yphCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="yphVerbiage"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="clientOrderIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information on the entity or customer service representative provisioning the order. "/> <b:properties> <b:property name="ns0:version" xpath="/*[local-name()='clientOrderIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes']/*[local-name()='version' and namespace-uri()='']"/> </b:properties> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="requestingClient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the client that is requesting this order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHTR"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates a unique order number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="rateCenter"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the location that central office switch is located in"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderQualifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field should be populated with data if there is a separate item that qualifies an order. For example, if the same order number can be used in different sites for the client, then this item would be included to differentiate one order over another."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="version"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the version of the order being submitted by the client. The APS System processes versions starting with 1, and expects supplements to up the version number by 1 every time the order changes during a supplement from the client system."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="99"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="marketCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies to which market the order should be sent."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="2"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="locationDesignation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes=" This structure contains the location designation and value fields such as room, room information, building type, building information or name and floor number. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="designator" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the location designator of the regional address. For example, information included in this field would indicate if the address is at an APT."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="value" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the location value of the regional address. For example, information included in this field indicates the apartment number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addressInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This element identifies the address where the Provider is mailing bills for services provided to the end user. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="numberedPrefix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="directionalPrefix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the directional prefix of the service address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "N" would be the directional prefix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="(N|S)?(E|W)?"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="houseNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the house number of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "120" would be the house number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="streetName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the street name of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "Main" would be the street name. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="thoroughfareType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the thoroughfare of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "St" would be the thoroughfare. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="box" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="route" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="numberedSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the numbered suffix of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "1/4" would be the numbered suffix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="directionalSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the directional suffix of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "S" would be the directional suffix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="(N|S)?(E|W)?"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="3" minOccurs="0" ref="s1:locationDesignation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="city"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the city of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "Minneapolis" would be the city. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="state"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the state of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "MN" would be the state. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z][A-Z]"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> <xs:length value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="zipcode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the zip code of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "55402" would be the zip code. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{5}([0-9]{4})?"/> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="moveIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Flags the order for notification of a new address if the customer is moving and porting at the same time."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="YES"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="clientContact"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information on the entity or value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHTR LNP"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="email" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the email address of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="faxNumber" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the fax number of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{10}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lineService"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields associated with provisioning telephone service for the line (example, fields associated with the <xs:enumeration value="MIGRATE-AS-SPECIFIED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="numberPortabilityAdministrationCenter"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of NPAC (Number Portability Administration Center) transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="scheduleDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="The date the activity is scheduled to occur. Same as DDD on order. This is the acceptDate for Accept Push transactions. This is the Schedule Date for Pull and Modify TN transactions. This is the Disconnect Date for disconnect transactions. Usage: Required Format: MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm:ss"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="19"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{4} [0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="lnpType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the type of port. Applicable for Accept Push, Pull and Modify TN transactions. Valid Values: 0 = Port type not known 1 = Local Service Provider Port 2 = Local Intra-service Provider Port 3 = Pooled block number port"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PORT TYPE NOT KNOWN"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL SERVICE PROVIDER PORT"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL INTRA-SERVICE PROVIDER PORT"/> <xs:enumeration value="POOLED BLOCK NUMBER PORT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="portToOriginal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates if porting back to original provider. Applicable for Accept Push, Pull and Modify TN transactions. Valid Values: 0 = unknown 1 = Y 2 = N"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="modifyTN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of NPAC (Number Portability Administration Center) modify TN transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="causeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the reason if authorization is not given. Usage: Required Values: 1= NO VALUE 2=NPAC SMS AUTOMATIC CANCELLATION 3=LSR NOT RECEIVED 4=FOC NOT ISSUED 5=DUE DATE MISMATCH 6=VACANT NUMBER PORT 7=GENERAL CONFLICT"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="NO VALUE"/> <xs:pattern value="NPAC SMS AUTOMATIC CANCELLATION"/> <xs:pattern value="LSR NOT RECEIVED"/> <xs:pattern value="FOC NOT ISSUED"/> <xs:pattern value="DUE DATE MISMATCH"/> <xs:pattern value="VACANT NUMBER PORT"/> <xs:pattern value="GENERAL CONFLICT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="needed"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field pertains to whether or not causeCode is required. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NEEDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="NOT NEEDED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="enhanced911"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of E911 (enhanced 911) transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="typeOfService"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Values of: 3 = Non-Pub is the only value being pasted that this time from the clients"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9AW]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="customerAccountRecordExchange"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of CARE (Customer Account Record Exchange) transactions "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tradingPartner"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies to which trading partner the order should be sent. This will also determine if the order will be processed systematically or manually"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="billingTelephoneNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the end user's BTN (may or may not be dialable) as it currently appears in the Provider billing records. This field could also contain a billing account number. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customerCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the Customer (End User) Code which further identifies the "Billing Telephone Number (BTN)-Current/New" in the Provider billing records, e.g., a check digit, julian date, or account number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="listingType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies whether the end user's account/line is proprietary or not. Valid values are as follows: Blank = Unknown 1 = Non-Pub - Not given out via Directory Assistance and not in directory or = Non-List - Not in directory but may be obtained from Directory Assistance 2 = Non-List - Not in directory but may be obtained from Directory Assistance 3 = Non-Pub - Not given out via Directory Assistance and not in directory 4 = Listed and Published - In directory and given out via Directory Assistance 5 = Listed and Published - In directory and requested to be non- solicited"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[1-5]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="oldBillingTelephoneNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the end user's previous BTN. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="oldCustomerCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the previous Customer (End User) Code as related to the Billing Telephone Number (BTN)-Old. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="languageIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element defines the end-user's preferred language. Valid values are as follows: A = Arabic B = Braille C = Cantonese E = English F = French G = German H = Hindi I = Italian J = Japanese K = Korean L = Tagalog (Filipino) M = Mandarin N = Navajo O = Other P = Polish Q = Portuguese R = Russian S = Spanish T = TTD U = Farsi V = Vietnamese Y = Yiddish"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Arabic"/> <xs:pattern value="Braille"/> <xs:pattern value="Cantonese"/> <xs:pattern value="English"/> <xs:pattern value="French"/> <xs:pattern value="German"/> <xs:pattern value="Hindi"/> <xs:pattern value="Italian"/> <xs:pattern value="Japanese"/> <xs:pattern value="Korean"/> <xs:pattern value="Tagalog"/> <xs:pattern value="Mandarin"/> <xs:pattern value="Navajo"/> <xs:pattern value="Other"/> <xs:pattern value="Polish"/> <xs:pattern value="Portuguese"/> <xs:pattern value="Russian"/> <xs:pattern value="Spanish"/> <xs:pattern value="TTD"/> <xs:pattern value="Farsi"/> <xs:pattern value="Vietnamese"/> <xs:pattern value="Yiddish"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tollCapIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies a Toll Cap on an end user's WTN. It could be initiated by the Provider or the end user. Y - Toll Cap, blank - not used/not applicable"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Y"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jurisdictionalIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the type of service to be selected in a multiple PIC environment (i.e., interLATA, intraLATA, international). Valid values are as follows: 1 = Restricted to subscribed CIC 2 = Restricted to another CIC 3 = Restricted to another CIC, not associated with submitting AC 4 = Restricted to another CIC, associated with submitting AC 5 = Restricted, no PIC PIC Restricted for: A = IntraLATA Service B = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service C = InterLATA Service/International Service D = IntraLATA Service/International Service E = InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service F = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/International Service G = InterLATA Service H = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service I = International Service b/ = Not Applicable"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="2"/> <xs:pattern value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="A"/> <xs:pattern value="B"/> <xs:pattern value="C"/> <xs:pattern value="D"/> <xs:pattern value="E"/> <xs:pattern value="F"/> <xs:pattern value="G"/> <xs:pattern value="H"/> <xs:pattern value="I"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="listingServicesIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies whether the end-user's account and/or line has unsolicited Listing Services. xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:s7="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.ReleaseTNNotification" xmlns:s6="http://CHTROrder.CHTRTransactionTypes" xmlns:s5="http://CHTROrder.CHTRResponseTypes" xmlns:s4="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CHTRLIDBRequest" xmlns:s3="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CHTRE911Request" xmlns:s2="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CHTRCARERequest" xmlns:s1="http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes" xmlns:s0="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns0="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema" xmlns:b="http://schemas.microsoft.com/BizTalk/2003" xmlns="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:imports> <b:namespace location=".\propertyschema.xsd" prefix="ns0" uri="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema"/> </b:imports> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="OrderIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:properties> <b:property name="ns0:clientOrderNumber" xpath="/*[local-name()='OrderIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.CheckInNotify']/*[local-name()='clientOrderNumber' and namespace-uri()='']"/> </b:properties> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates a unique order number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns0="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema" xmlns:b="http://schemas.microsoft.com/BizTalk/2003" xmlns="http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:imports> <b:namespace location=".\propertyschema.xsd" prefix="ns0" uri="http://CMSO.CHTR.Schemas.PropertySchema.PropertySchema"/> </b:imports> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="customer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information about the the end user being provisioned"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerAccountNumber"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerSocialSecurityNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This is the End User's Social Security Number. This represents the unique ID for each residential end user (particularly for CARE transactions). If the end user is a business entity, it will have no Social Security Number and the unique ID will be the Federal Tax ID. If both the SSN and Federal Tax ID are populated, SSN should take precedence as the unique ID."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerFederalTaxID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This is the end user's Federal Tax ID. This is used as the unique ID for business entities. If both SSN and Federal Tax ID fields are populated, SSN should take precedence in becoming the unique ID."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="customerFullName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the full name of the end user customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="customerType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies if the customer is a business or residential customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="RES"/> <xs:pattern value="BUS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="oldCustomerType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies if the customer used to be a business or residential customer."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="RES"/> <xs:pattern value="BUS"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="multiLineIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates if this is a multiline or single line account"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> <xs:minLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="MULTI"/> <xs:pattern value="SINGLE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="agencyAuthorization"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies that the end user customer has given authorization for this local service request."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="agencyAuthorizationDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the date of the agency authorization. The date format is MMDDYY in Central Time."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="billingName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the name of the responsible billing party to whom the Access Provider renders the bill for services provided."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="billingAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="regionalAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="masterAddress"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="customerPIN"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="groupID"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="authorizationName"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="45"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="directoryListing"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields associated with the directory listings "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="1"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingActivity"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the activity for the directory listing."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETE"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHANGE NEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHANGE OLD"/> <xs:enumeration value="NO CHANGE"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingRecordType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the type of listing according to tariffs. For example, this indicates a main listing or an additional listing. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL MAIN LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL ADDITIONAL MAIN LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL ADDITIONAL LISTING"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingPublicationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the type of listings being submitted with respect to publication and directory assistance (DA) rules. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="PUBLISHED"/> <xs:pattern value="NON-PUBLISHED"/> <xs:pattern value="NON-LISTED"/> <xs:pattern value="PRIVATE"/> <xs:pattern value="NO DIRECTORY"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingStyleCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies whether the listing is a straight line, caption header, etc."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="STRAIGHT LINE"/> <xs:enumeration value="XXX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="listingDegreeIndentation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies how many degrees the listing is indented."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="0"/> <xs:enumeration value="X"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dualNameListing"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies if a listing is to be a dual name listing. For example, John & Mary"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Y"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listingLastName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the first word for business listing or the complete last name for residence listings."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listingFirstName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates all except the first word for business listings or all of the first name or names and middle name or initials for residence listings. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="titleOfLineageSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to designate lineage of a listed person, e.g. Jr, Sr, III, etc. In the case of a dual name listing, this indicates the lineage for the first name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dualNameTitleOfLineageSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to designate lineage of a listed person, e.g. Jr, Sr, III, etc. In the case of a dual name listing, this indicates the lineage for the second name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="titleOfAddressPrefix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to address a listed person, e.g. Mr, Dr, etc. For a dual name listing, this field represents the address of the first name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dualNameTitleOfAddressPrefix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates a phrase used to address a listed person, e.g. Mr, Dr, etc. For a dual name listing, this field represents the address of the second name."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="omitAddressIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates if the listing address should be omitted from directory assistance or the published directory."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="OMIT ADDRESS"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listedAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields associated with the address found in the directory listing "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" ref="s1:addressInformation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="existingAdvertising"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies the end userâ€™s advertising status in the Yellow Pages."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Y"/> <xs:pattern value="N"/> <xs:pattern value="UNKNOWN"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listingDesignation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the professional designation phrase of a business listing."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nickname"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sic"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="yphCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="yphVerbiage"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="100"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]+"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="clientOrderIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information on the entity or customer service representative provisioning the order. "/> <b:properties> <b:property name="ns0:version" xpath="/*[local-name()='clientOrderIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://CHTROrder.CHTRBaseTypes']/*[local-name()='version' and namespace-uri()='']"/> </b:properties> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="requestingClient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the client that is requesting this order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHTR"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates a unique order number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="rateCenter"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the location that central office switch is located in"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="clientOrderQualifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field should be populated with data if there is a separate item that qualifies an order. For example, if the same order number can be used in different sites for the client, then this item would be included to differentiate one order over another."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="version"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the version of the order being submitted by the client. The APS System processes versions starting with 1, and expects supplements to up the version number by 1 every time the order changes during a supplement from the client system."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"> <xs:minInclusive value="1"/> <xs:maxInclusive value="99"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="marketCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies to which market the order should be sent."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="2"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="locationDesignation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes=" This structure contains the location designation and value fields such as room, room information, building type, building information or name and floor number. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="designator" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the location designator of the regional address. For example, information included in this field would indicate if the address is at an APT."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="value" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field indicates the location value of the regional address. For example, information included in this field indicates the apartment number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addressInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This element identifies the address where the Provider is mailing bills for services provided to the end user. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="numberedPrefix" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="directionalPrefix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the directional prefix of the service address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "N" would be the directional prefix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="(N|S)?(E|W)?"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="houseNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the house number of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "120" would be the house number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="streetName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the street name of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "Main" would be the street name. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="thoroughfareType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the thoroughfare of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "St" would be the thoroughfare. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="box" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="route" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="numberedSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the numbered suffix of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "1/4" would be the numbered suffix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="directionalSuffix"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the directional suffix of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "S" would be the directional suffix. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="(N|S)?(E|W)?"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="3" minOccurs="0" ref="s1:locationDesignation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="city"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the city of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "Minneapolis" would be the city. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="state"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the state of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "MN" would be the state. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z][A-Z]"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> <xs:length value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="zipcode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the zip code of address. For example, an address of N 1/2 120 1/4 Main St S Minneapolis MN 55402, the "55402" would be the zip code. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{5}([0-9]{4})?"/> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="moveIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Flags the order for notification of a new address if the customer is moving and porting at the same time."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="YES"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="clientContact"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains information on the entity or customer service representative submitting the order "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="name" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the name of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="CHTR LNP"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="email" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the email address of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="telephoneNumber" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the telephone number of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="faxNumber" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the fax number of the entity or customer representative that is submitting the order."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{10}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lineService"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields associated with provisioning telephone service for the line (example, fields associated with the Number Portability transaction) "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="lineActivity"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field identifies the activity on the line "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="20"/> <xs:enumeration value="MIGRATE-AS-SPECIFIED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="numberPortabilityAdministrationCenter"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of NPAC (Number Portability Administration Center) transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="scheduleDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="The date the activity is scheduled to occur. Same as DDD on order. This is the acceptDate for Accept Push transactions. This is the Schedule Date for Pull and Modify TN transactions. This is the Disconnect Date for disconnect transactions. Usage: Required Format: MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm:ss"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="19"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{4} [0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="lnpType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the type of port. Applicable for Accept Push, Pull and Modify TN transactions. Valid Values: 0 = Port type not known 1 = Local Service Provider Port 2 = Local Intra-service Provider Port 3 = Pooled block number port"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PORT TYPE NOT KNOWN"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL SERVICE PROVIDER PORT"/> <xs:enumeration value="LOCAL INTRA-SERVICE PROVIDER PORT"/> <xs:enumeration value="POOLED BLOCK NUMBER PORT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="portToOriginal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates if porting back to original provider. Applicable for Accept Push, Pull and Modify TN transactions. Valid Values: 0 = unknown 1 = Y 2 = N"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="modifyTN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of NPAC (Number Portability Administration Center) modify TN transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="causeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Indicates the reason if authorization is not given. Usage: Required Values: 1= NO VALUE 2=NPAC SMS AUTOMATIC CANCELLATION 3=LSR NOT RECEIVED 4=FOC NOT ISSUED 5=DUE DATE MISMATCH 6=VACANT NUMBER PORT 7=GENERAL CONFLICT"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="NO VALUE"/> <xs:pattern value="NPAC SMS AUTOMATIC CANCELLATION"/> <xs:pattern value="LSR NOT RECEIVED"/> <xs:pattern value="FOC NOT ISSUED"/> <xs:pattern value="DUE DATE MISMATCH"/> <xs:pattern value="VACANT NUMBER PORT"/> <xs:pattern value="GENERAL CONFLICT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="needed"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This field pertains to whether or not causeCode is required. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NEEDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="NOT NEEDED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="enhanced911"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of E911 (enhanced 911) transactions"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="typeOfService"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Values of: 3 = Non-Pub is the only value being pasted that this time from the clients"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9AW]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="customerAccountRecordExchange"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section contains fields specifically needed for the processing of CARE (Customer Account Record Exchange) transactions "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:all minOccurs="0"> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tradingPartner"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Identifies to which trading partner the order should be sent. This will also determine if the order will be processed systematically or manually"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="billingTelephoneNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the end user's BTN (may or may not be dialable) as it currently appears in the Provider billing records. This field could also contain a billing account number. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="customerCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the Customer (End User) Code which further identifies the "Billing Telephone Number (BTN)-Current/New" in the Provider billing records, e.g., a check digit, julian date, or account number."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="listingType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies whether the end user's account/line is proprietary or not. Valid values are as follows: Blank = Unknown 1 = Non-Pub - Not given out via Directory Assistance and not in directory or = Non-List - Not in directory but may be obtained from Directory Assistance 2 = Non-List - Not in directory but may be obtained from Directory Assistance 3 = Non-Pub - Not given out via Directory Assistance and not in directory 4 = Listed and Published - In directory and given out via Directory Assistance 5 = Listed and Published - In directory and requested to be non- solicited"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[1-5]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="oldBillingTelephoneNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the end user's previous BTN. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="oldCustomerCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the previous Customer (End User) Code as related to the Billing Telephone Number (BTN)-Old. "/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[\w\d]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="languageIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element defines the end-user's preferred language. Valid values are as follows: A = Arabic B = Braille C = Cantonese E = English F = French G = German H = Hindi I = Italian J = Japanese K = Korean L = Tagalog (Filipino) M = Mandarin N = Navajo O = Other P = Polish Q = Portuguese R = Russian S = Spanish T = TTD U = Farsi V = Vietnamese Y = Yiddish"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Arabic"/> <xs:pattern value="Braille"/> <xs:pattern value="Cantonese"/> <xs:pattern value="English"/> <xs:pattern value="French"/> <xs:pattern value="German"/> <xs:pattern value="Hindi"/> <xs:pattern value="Italian"/> <xs:pattern value="Japanese"/> <xs:pattern value="Korean"/> <xs:pattern value="Tagalog"/> <xs:pattern value="Mandarin"/> <xs:pattern value="Navajo"/> <xs:pattern value="Other"/> <xs:pattern value="Polish"/> <xs:pattern value="Portuguese"/> <xs:pattern value="Russian"/> <xs:pattern value="Spanish"/> <xs:pattern value="TTD"/> <xs:pattern value="Farsi"/> <xs:pattern value="Vietnamese"/> <xs:pattern value="Yiddish"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tollCapIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies a Toll Cap on an end user's WTN. It could be initiated by the Provider or the end user. Y - Toll Cap, blank - not used/not applicable"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="Y"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="jurisdictionalIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies the type of service to be selected in a multiple PIC environment (i.e., interLATA, intraLATA, international). Valid values are as follows: A = IntraLATA Service B = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service C = InterLATA Service/International Service D = IntraLATA Service/International Service E = InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service F = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/International Service G = InterLATA Service H = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service I = International Service blank = Not Applicable or Non LATA Single PIC Environment"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="A"/> <xs:pattern value="B"/> <xs:pattern value="C"/> <xs:pattern value="D"/> <xs:pattern value="E"/> <xs:pattern value="F"/> <xs:pattern value="G"/> <xs:pattern value="H"/> <xs:pattern value="I"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="switchedDataIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies switched service types. Valid values are as follows: D = Circuit Switched Data E = Switched Data and Voice F = Packet Switched Data G = Packet Switched Data and Voice H = Circuit Switched Data, Packet Switched Data and Voice I = Circuit Switched Data, Packet Switched Data J = Packet Switched Data on D Channel K = Switched Data on B Channel 56KB L = Switched Data on B Channel 64KB blank = Voice only"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="D"/> <xs:pattern value="E"/> <xs:pattern value="F"/> <xs:pattern value="G"/> <xs:pattern value="H"/> <xs:pattern value="I"/> <xs:pattern value="J"/> <xs:pattern value="K"/> <xs:pattern value="L"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="picRestrictedIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies an end user request that PIC activity on the Working Telephone Number (WTN) be restricted. AC requests to change the PIC are not accepted when this indicator contains specific values. These values may be used in either a single or multi-PIC environment. Valid values are as follows: 1 = Restricted to subscribed CIC 2 = Restricted to another CIC 3 = Restricted to another CIC, not associated with submitting AC 4 = Restricted to another CIC, associated with submitting AC 5 = Restricted, no PIC PIC Restricted for: A = IntraLATA Service B = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service C = InterLATA Service/International Service D = IntraLATA Service/International Service E = InterLATA Service/Assumed International Service F = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service/International Service G = InterLATA Service H = IntraLATA Service/InterLATA Service I = International Service b/ = Not Applicable"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="2"/> <xs:pattern value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="A"/> <xs:pattern value="B"/> <xs:pattern value="C"/> <xs:pattern value="D"/> <xs:pattern value="E"/> <xs:pattern value="F"/> <xs:pattern value="G"/> <xs:pattern value="H"/> <xs:pattern value="I"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="listingServicesIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies whether the end-user's account and/or line has unsolicited Listing Services. Valid values are as follows: 1 = Remove the customer from Telemarketing Lists and add * to white pages of Directory. 2 = Remove the end user from Direct Mail and Telemarketing Lists. 3 = Remove the end user from Telemarketing Lists only. 4 = Remove the end user from Direct Mail and also from directory. 5 = Remove from Email Marketing Lists. 6 = Remove from Direct Mail, Telemarketing, and Email Marketing Lists."/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="2"/> <xs:pattern value="3"/> <xs:pattern value="4"/> <xs:pattern value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tollBlockServiceSuspendedIndicator"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="This element identifies that toll is blocked or service is suspended. Valid values are as follows: blank = Not blocked or not supported 1 = Blocked at end userâ€™s request 2 = All toll blocked - Provider initiated 3 = Toll blocked to selected AC(s) 4 = Line based (non-toll) services blocked to selected AC(s) 5 = Service suspended for non-payment - Provider initiated 6 = Toll Cap Limit Exceeded 7 = Service Suspended â€“ End User Requested 8 = Reserved for Future Use 9 = 900 Service Entity Block"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="PIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Pre subscription indicator code"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{1,5}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{1,5}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="oldPIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:fieldInfo notes="Previous pre subscription indicator code"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{1,5}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> code"/> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="[\d]{1,5}"/> <xs:pattern value="()"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="callingNameInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <b:recordInfo notes="This section
